General.Name: Bichamp Cutting Technology Hunan Co Ltd
General.Description: Bichamp Cutting Technology (Hunan) Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells bandsaw blades in China. Its products are used in alloy steel, bearing steel, die steel, stainless steel, abrasive tool steel, titanium alloys, aerospace alloys, and non-ferrous applications. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Changsha, China.

2.Name: Mr. Ying Bo  Xie
2.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
